body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarHQ customer support. My name is Gregory Barnes and I'm here to assist you. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Maria. Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, four six two, eight nine one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Can you also confirm your email address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Certainly, my email address is mtorres@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Maria. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit nervous about the car inventory situation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Maria. Rest assured, we'll address your concerns. Your satisfaction is our priority.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out and sharing your details with us. We'll work on resolving the inventory issue promptly. Have a great day, Maria.
